class litesoph.gui.input_validation.Decimalentry(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: tkinter.ttk.Entry

Constructs a Ttk Entry widget with the parent master.

STANDARD OPTIONS

class, cursor, style, takefocus, xscrollcommand

WIDGET-SPECIFIC OPTIONS

exportselection, invalidcommand, justify, show, state, textvariable, validate, validatecommand, width

VALIDATION MODES

none, key, focus, focusin, focusout, all

validate(inp)[source]

Force revalidation, independent of the conditions specified by the validate option. Returns False if validation fails, True if it succeeds. Sets or clears the invalid state accordingly.

litesoph.gui.menubar module

class litesoph.gui.menubar.GenericMainMenu(parent, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: tkinter.Menu

The Application’s main menu

Construct menu widget with the parent MASTER.

Valid resource names: activebackground, activeborderwidth, activeforeground, background, bd, bg, borderwidth, cursor, disabledforeground, fg, font, foreground, postcommand, relief, selectcolor, takefocus, tearoff, tearoffcommand, title, type.

accelerators = {'file_open': 'Ctrl+O', 'quit': 'Ctrl+Q'}
keybinds = {'<Control-o>': '<<FileSelect>>', '<Control-q>': '<<FileQuit>>'}
show_about()[source]

Show the about dialog

styles = {}
class litesoph.gui.menubar.LinuxMainMenu(parent, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: litesoph.gui.menubar.GenericMainMenu

Differences for Linux:

  • Edit menu for autofill options

  • View menu for font & theme options

  • Use color theme for menu

Construct menu widget with the parent MASTER.

Valid resource names: activebackground, activeborderwidth, activeforeground, background, bd, bg, borderwidth, cursor, disabledforeground, fg, font, foreground, postcommand, relief, selectcolor, takefocus, tearoff, tearoffcommand, title, type.

styles = {'activebackground': '#777', 'activeforeground': 'white', 'foreground': 'black', 'relief': 'groove'}
class litesoph.gui.menubar.MacOsMainMenu(parent, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: litesoph.gui.menubar.GenericMainMenu

Differences for MacOS:

  • Create App Menu

  • Move about to app menu, remove ‘help’

  • Remove redundant quit command

  • Change accelerators to Command-[]

  • Add View menu for font & theme options

  • Add Edit menu for autofill options

  • Add Window menu for navigation commands

Construct menu widget with the parent MASTER.

Valid resource names: activebackground, activeborderwidth, activeforeground, background, bd, bg, borderwidth, cursor, disabledforeground, fg, font, foreground, postcommand, relief, selectcolor, takefocus, tearoff, tearoffcommand, title, type.

accelerators = {'file_open': 'Cmd-O'}
keybinds = {'<Command-o>': '<<FileSelect>>'}
litesoph.gui.menubar.get_main_menu_for_os(os_name)[source]

Return the menu class appropriate to the given OS

litesoph.gui.user_data.update_remote_profile_list(profile)[source]

It adds new profile to the list. If the profile is already present it’s moved to the top.
